title: Hiver <> YUSO - AI for email replies

signals.Ask: We want AI to effectively utilize our existing knowledge base, starting with validated public information, and expand as we gain trust in its capabilities.
signals.Evidence: We will start with a very limited set which are just the public question facts and answers and questions that are on our public website because we know that's also fully validated. And we want already to see how powerful AI is our hybrid is in, does it already find the right answer in that?
